instructions:
Heat fat in small sauce pan and add green pepper, onion and garlic. Simmer about 5 minutes or until soft
but not browned. Add remaining ingredients and continue cooking over low heat 40 or 50 minutes or until
thick. Makes about 2 cups. Use for the sauce of Spanish omelet. Also as seasoning sauce for stuffed
peppers.
name: Creole Sauce
creator: Better Homes & Garden
